Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

req mods: LLL SXT, IR, Kerbpaint, Bahas engines (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82341-23-5-Bahamuto-Dynamics-CritterCrawler-AnimatedEngines-etc-v1-0-%28Jun7%29)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6i6t9vbrvbb2h1u/Toothless.craft

BEHOLD! A toothless inspired dragon!

It can flap, dive, and do all sorts of things!

requires infinite fuel

Flying instrctuions:

Set fold wing speed to 2, and flap to 7-15, depending on speed you wish (capeable of flying without engines)

Action groups: Abort/backspace: Fire from nose, use as retro rockets

1: Main engines

2: VTOL engines

3: Extend wings

4: Retract wings

5: Flap down

6: Flap up

Good luck, happy riding!

If you cannot watch it in your country, have a link to pure video non-youtube: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ew6wolj81ujwdoh/toothless.mp4

Edited June 21, 2014 by The Destroyer
If only we had the ability to program the joints to cycle or something. Still cool and well executed!

Not bad, though I think you know where you got the idea

I do think that the mods that you used really helped this dragon out. I would love to use mods on some of my new designs... but I don't want to break a two-year-long no-mod streak.

Not bad, though I think you know where you got the idea

I do think that the mods that you used really helped this dragon out. I would love to use mods on some of my new designs... but I don't want to break a two-year-long no-mod streak.

Yeah, I loved yours. But after seeing howto train your dragon two I wanted to make it.
I have the required mods installed, but in the SPH it says locked or invalid parts. I have tried using IR .15d and .16.1 but it doesnt work with either version.

AHA! I was using bahas retractable engines!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82341-23-5-Bahamuto-Dynamics-CritterCrawler-AnimatedEngines-etc-v1-0-%28Jun7%29
What version of IR did you use to make this? I have SXT, Baha's Engines, Kerbpaint, and IR 0.16.1 and it still doesn't work.
That is so effin' cool! I'm also jealous of the paint job, since I've never been able to make KerbPaint work.

What version of IR did you use to make this? I have SXT, Baha's Engines, Kerbpaint, and IR 0.16.1 and it still doesn't work.

Strange. I installed it on April, if that helps for versions. Press alt+f2 while clicking the craft in SPH, maybe it will say. I was using "Kerbal hotseat" but then I uninstalled it, so that might be the part.

That is so effin' cool! I'm also jealous of the paint job, since I've never been able to make KerbPaint work.

Make sure its a paintable part. Not all are. Press P on a part and the kerbpiant GUI should open up.

How did you do the flaps?

Old post, but I got rep from this post just now, so I might aswell revive this.

I'm not sure what you mean. By "flapping" I used IR.
